mdRecord.dcterms:title: Chart of the West Indies and Spanish Dominions in North America / by A. Arrowsmith ; Jones, Smith & Co., sc. Beaufort Buildgs., Strand
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Arrowsmith, Aaron, 1750-1823
Jones & Smith.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Published June 1st, 1803, by A. Arrowsmith, No. 24 Rathbone Place
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by hachures, depths shown by soundings.
Map shows West Indies, Florida, Central America, and northern part of South America.
"Four sheets. Size (when joined), 75 x 47 1/2 inches." Cf. Tooley, R.V. The mapping of America, v. 2, p. 106.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: G4900 1803 .A77: Has been cut into 32 sections (30.5 x 24 cm. each), and mounted on linen. In slipcase, on shelf. Paul Mellon bequest, May 12, 2000.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Area Table 7 1803 Arrowsmith: Imperfect: several tears along fold lines. 4 sheets in 2. Tracy W. McGregor Collection, American History Collection.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mellon, Paul--Library--Personal copy.
West Indies--Maps.
Central America--Maps.
Florida--Maps.
